Settings¶

class orbitpy.mission.Settings(outDir=None, coverageType=None, propTimeResFactor=None, gridResFactor=None, opaqueAtmosHeight=None, midAccessOnly=None, _id=None)[source]¶

Data container of the mission settings.

Variables

  • outDir (str) – Output directory path.

  • coverageType (str or None) – Type of coverage calculation.

  • propTimeResFactor (float) – Factor which influences the propagation step-size calculation. See orbitpy.propagator.compute_time_step.

  • gridResFactor (float) – Factor which influences the grid-resolution of an auto-generated grid. See orbitpy.grid.compute_grid_res.

  • opaqueAtmosHeight (float) – Relevant in-case of inter-satellite communications. Height of atmosphere (in kilometers) below which line-of-sight communication between two satellites cannot take place. Default value is 0 km.

  • midAccessOnly (bool) – Flag to have only the access-times at the middle of access-intervals. The flag is set to True when coverage calculations are done for narrow FOV instruments like SAR or pushbroom-optical sensors using a sceneFOV (or FOR defined by a sceneFOV). See Correction of access files for purely side-looking instruments with narrow along-track FOV.

  • _id (int/ str) – Unique identifier of the settings object.

Methods Summary

Methods Documentation

__init__(outDir=None, coverageType=None, propTimeResFactor=None, gridResFactor=None, opaqueAtmosHeight=None, midAccessOnly=None, _id=None)[source]¶

Initialize an entity.

Parameters

  • _id (str) – (default: None)

  • _type (str) – (default: “Entity”)

static from_dict(d)[source]¶

Parses an Settings object from a normalized JSON dictionary.

Parameters

d – Dictionary with the Settings specifications.

Following dictionary keys are expected:

  • outDir: Output directory path. Default is the location of the current directory.

  • coverageType: Type of coverage calculation. Default value is None.

  • propTimeResFactor: Factor which influences the propagation step-size calculation. See orbitpy.propagator.compute_time_step. Default value is 0.25.

  • gridResFactor: Factor which influences the grid-resolution of an auto-generated grid. See orbitpy.grid.compute_grid_res. Default value is 0.9.

  • opaqueAtmosHeight: Relevant in-case of inter-satellite communications. Height of atmosphere (in kilometers) below which line-of-sight communication between two satellites cannot take place. Default value is 0 km.

  • midAccessOnly: Flag to have only the access-times at the middle of access-intervals. The flag is set to True when coverage calculations are done for narrow FOV instruments like SAR or pushbroom-optical sensors using a sceneFOV (or FOR defined by a sceneFOV). See Correction of access files for purely side-looking instruments with narrow along-track FOV.

  • @id: Unique identifier. Default is None.

Returns

Settings object.

Return type
